overview: Hanan is an only daughter to a rich merchant. She claims that she went blind in order to escape from marriage. Hanan's father is confused and the doctors are unable to treat her. So a psychiatrist called, Dr. Ali, who brings with him his friend Hassan, who claims to be a doctor, especially after the attractive reward that the father decided to treat his only daughter. Ali and Hassan start treating Hanan, Hassan discovers that Hanan is not blind, and a love affair begins between them.
title: نبتدي منين الحكاية
